thread.title: 38. For a Moment, I Was Lost - Amber Run
thread.title_full: 38. For a Moment, I Was Lost - Amber Run

title: 38. For a Moment, I Was Lost - Amber Run
text: by Hobbgoblin 1 I've been listening to them for a while now and my god this album is amazing so far. I can't wait till the full album is released. Sounds Great by RealRocky101 I love the sound of Amber Run. I'm truly surprised they're not really popular. I'm sure they will be soon though! Wow! by Jjimenez851 No answers is such an addicting song. This album is gonna be the best one yet. Hopefully they have something similar to 5am Biography Formed: 2012 in Nottingham, England Genre: Alternative Years Active: '10s British quintet Amber Run deliver lush, cinematic pop with a moody and introspective tone. Singer/guitarist Joe Keogh, guitarist Will Jones, and bassist Tom Sperring were old friends from grammar school who later met keyboardist Henry Wyeth and drummer Felix Archer at the University of Nottingham, where they formed the band in 2012. An early break put Amber Run on the BBC Introducing Stage of the Reading Festival, and by the end of 2013 they'd signed a deal with RCA Records. Under their new contract,... Top Albums and Songs by Amber Run 1.
